name: The Small World of Jack, the Cock
name_original: The Small World of Jack, the Cock
description:
“Hi.

I’m Jack. I’m a cock, and this is my small world.

Every day I must go to the chicken coop but getting there is always a challenge. There are enemies who pursue me and try to stop me, there are obstacles I must surpass or avoid and there are those who I shall bribe to get to my goal.

It’s tricky, but this is my SMALL WORLD.”

___

O objective do Jack é ir ter com a sua namorada, de quem é separado todos os dias, pelo dono da quinta.

Para tal, deverá superar os desafios presentes na quinta, ao longo de vários níveis.

You play as Jack the Cock and you must avoid enemies and obstacles, as well as solve the puzzles to finish the level and save his beloved chicken.

___

Controls:

Enter: Advance to game from title screen Arrows keys: To move the character, Jack left shift: Dash

___

Jogo por Bernardo Navas, Diogo Fernandes, Joana Ribeiro e Simão Moreira
